messages.subject: Fw: [unschoolingmn] MN Unschooling Waterpark Gathering, 2/26 & 2/27
messages.msgSnippet: My good friend Heather Brown is putting this together and I will be there I hope to see more Minnesota s and even Iowans ( and maybe a
messages.messageBody:
My good friend Heather Brown is putting this together and I will be there I hope to see more Minnesota's and even Iowans ( and maybe a Wisconsinite there!!!!!!!
 
Alex Polikowsky
http://polykow.blogspot.com/

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingmn/
 



----- Forwarded Message ----
From: "brownsplus2@..." <brownsplus2@...>
To: Alex Polikowsky <polykow@...>; unschoolingmn@yahoogroups.com; idea-2@yahoogroups.com; iaunschoolers@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 7, 2009 4:24:46 PM
Subject: [unschoolingmn] MN Unschooling Waterpark Gathering, 2/26 & 2/27



You're invited to join us for an informal
 unschooling adventure at the
 Great Serengeti Indoor Waterpark
Owatonna, Minnesota
Thursday & Friday,
Feb. 26th and 27th (Sat. and Sun. are booked up)
http://www.hiowaton na.com/waterpark .phtml
Book your room at: 507-446-8900 Group Name--M.U.S. (MN Un-Schoolers)
Limited room availability on Friday the 27th. Call now or asap to book your rooms early, if Friday night or a particular room style is desired.

(Located inside award winning Holiday
Inn/behind Cabella's--1 hour South of Minneapolis & 3 hours north of Des Moines) http://www.hiowaton na.com/waterpark .phtml

Group rates:
Two queen beds ~ $109 a night-- includes 5 wrist bands for waterpark good for day of arrival and next day until check out.
King
bed and pull out sofa ~ $149 a
night--includes 7 wristbands.
Kid Suites ~ $169 a night. Includes bunks beds and kitchenette. See hotel website for details on all room amenities.

Click here for a MAP to the Holiday Inn in Owatonna

Join the Yahoo List and add your name to the database, if desired and see "who is coming."
http://groups. yahoo.com/ group/owung/ 

Wristbands
for the waterpark is to use the day of arrival (see waterpark hours) and check
out day until 11am. Check in is 4pm. I believe extra wristbands are $6
person for homeschoolers. Prices vary depending on day of the week. It is normally $10 through the week and $12 on the weekend.

There may be a pizza gathering at the hotel, and we are still checking on whether or not the kids eat free at the hotel restaurant with the group rates. More details will be available this week on the Yahoo list for the gathering. See link above to join the Yahoo Group.

If all goes well we will plan another gathering for the fall
 and 2010 winter.
